page.title: 03THE POLICEMAN IN BROUGHTON
page.content: OUR LOCAL POLICEMAN HAS WORKED AS A POLICE MAN FOR THREE YEARS.FIRST HE WORKED FOR TWO YEARS IN NORTHAMPTON TOWN CENTRE.HE HAS WORKED IN BROUGHTON FOR ONE YEAR. HE CAME HERE BECAUSE HE WANTED TO HAVE A RURAL BEAT.YOU HAVE TO HAVE A WIFE TO BE A VILLAGE POLICEMAN.HE HAS GOT A SIX MONTH OLD BABY.HIS BEAT COVERS: BROUGHTON,PYTCHLEY,LODDINGTON,CRANSLEY, HARRINGTON,BRAYBROOKE,THORPE MALSOR AND UNDERWOOD.HIS TWO BIGGEST PROBLEMS ARE YOUTHSÂ£ VANDALISM AND TRAFFIC.HE LIKES THE FRIENDLY ATMOSPHERE HERE.HE SPENDS HIS SPARE TIME STUDYING FOR EXAMS SO THAT HE CAN BE A SERGEANT.HE THINKS IT IS HARD WORK.HE ALSO WALKS THE DOGS AND PLAYS RUGBY.HE LIKES HIS JOB A LOT. HE DOES EIGHT HOURS WORK AND THEN HE GOES HOME.
